resources.string:
usage: 
1. Select exagear's apk and wait for decoding to complete.
2. Check the functions, click patch button and wait for building to complete.
3. Click install button to install the patched apk.
notice:
1. It is not guaranteed that patching will be successful.
2. Apk's signature will be different after patching.Resign it on your own if necessary.
add function: manually select obb file
Change the location of drive D
Select exagear apk from installed apks list or local files. Wait until decoded session completes.
Check the function you want to add. Function descriptions are described below.
Click the \"start patch\" button and wait patientlly until building completes. The building info can be found in the log info.
After building the apk, click the \"install patched apk\" button to install it. Sigunature may change, so you might need to uninstalled the original installed apk.
This apk is an experimental project, and it is not guaranteed that the function will be added successfully

In some games, the mouse cursor only displays as a small cross or does not display at all. This function changes the cursor to a customized mouse image. The image is saved in assets/mouse.png in the apk file.
In the container settings, allow users to customize desktop\'s resolution. It is compatible with the original preset resolution selection.
After clicking\"start patch\" button, please don\'t click or move to other view, otherwise problems may occur.
"The patched apk is located in /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.ewt45.patchapp/files/patchtmp/tmp/dist/tmp_sign.apk. You can check it manually with third-party file manager app. "

"Since the patched apk is resigned, you may need to uninstall the original installed apk to install the patched apk.\nMoreover, virgl overlay apk requires the same signature and sharedUserId with exagear apk. The resigned exagear apk may not work with the original installed virgl overlay apk. One solution is to sign these two apk with the same signature manually and reinstall them. "
Add a floating action button at the right-end of the layout, providing some extra functions. Currently functions: Changing the drive d location.

The location of drive D inside the container is normally corresponding to /storage/emulated/0/Donwload or Exagear directory in android file system.\nThis function allows user to change the directory\'s location and customize its name. There will be an availability check after changing the location. If changed successfully, app needs to be restart so that the location will be updated.
Fix the crash of showing softinput method on android11 and above. After fixed, the launching of input method will be delayed for one second.

If apk is installed and it can\'t detect obb file, a method will be provided for user to select the obb file with system file picker. \nOn android 11 and above system file picker cannot view the Android/data or Android/obb directory.
Please check the Guide in action bar\'s menu before patching.
